verses.plain: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth.

tokens.t: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth.

verses.plain: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.

tokens.t: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.

verses.plain: For I rejoiced greatly, when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee, even as thou walkest in the truth.

tokens.t: For I rejoiced greatly, when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee, even as thou walkest in the truth.

verses.plain: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth.

tokens.t: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth.

verses.plain: Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren, and to strangers;

tokens.t: Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren, and to strangers;

verses.plain: Which have borne witness of thy charity before the church: whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort, thou shalt do well:

tokens.t: Which have borne witness of thy charity before the church: whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort, thou shalt do well:

verses.plain: Because that for his name’s sake they went forth, taking nothing of the Gentiles.

tokens.t: Because that for his name’s sake they went forth, taking nothing of the Gentiles.

verses.plain: We therefore ought to receive such, that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth.

tokens.t: We therefore ought to receive such, that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth.

verses.plain: I wrote unto the church: but Diotrephes, who loveth to have the preeminence among them, receiveth us not.

tokens.t: I wrote unto the church: but Diotrephes, who loveth to have the preeminence among them, receiveth us not.

verses.plain: Wherefore, if I come, I will remember his deeds which he doeth, prating against us with malicious words: and not content therewith, neither doth he himself receive the brethren, and forbiddeth them that would, and casteth them out of the church.

verses.plain: Beloved, follow not that which is evil, but that which is good. He that doeth good is of God: but he that doeth evil hath not seen God.

tokens.t: Beloved, follow not that which is evil, but that which is good. He that doeth good is of God: but he that doeth evil hath not seen God.

verses.plain: Demetrius hath good report of all men, and of the truth itself: yea, and we also bear record; and ye know that our record is true.

tokens.t: Demetrius hath good report of all
, and of the truth itself: yea, and we
bear record; and ye know that our record is true.

verses.plain: I had many things to write, but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee:

tokens.t: I had many things to write, but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee:

verses.plain: But I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak face to face. Peace be to thee. Our friends salute thee. Greet the friends by name.
